capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Providing visitor service support and promoting visitor attractions and experiences, responding to customer enquiries.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Yarning with community, dealing effectively with cultural differences, and handling customer enquiries with diplomacy.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Working as part of a team that values connection to Country, respects cultural knowledge, and works closely with Traditional Owners.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Respecting and valuing the deep spiritual and cultural significance of Worimi Country and its conservation lands.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Adhering to the provisions of the NSW Anti-discrimination Act (1977) in an Aboriginal-identified role.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Maintaining a high level of vigilance and awareness of personal safety during park compliance patrol duties.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for managing and promoting visitor attractions and experiences, including compliance patrol duties.

skills.name: Cultural Knowledge and Sensitivity
skills.description: Understanding and respecting Aboriginal cultural heritage and working closely with Traditional Owners.

skills.name: Customer Service and Negotiation
skills.description: Providing support for visitor services and effectively handling enquiries and negotiations.

skills.name: Safety and Compliance Awareness
skills.description: Conducting park compliance patrol duties with a high level of vigilance and awareness of personal safety.

generalRole.title: Aboriginal Cultural Heritage and Visitor Services Coordinator
generalRole.description: This role involves working on Country to manage and protect natural and cultural values, providing visitor services, and engaging with the community and Traditional Owners. It requires a blend of environmental conservation skills, cultural sensitivity, and customer service.
